mapper.select: SELECT M.MSEQ, M.TITLE, M.BRANCH_SQ, B.NAME AS BRANCH_NAME, M.KIND, M.NOTE, M.ESTDATE, M.STATE FROM MOVE M, BRANCH B, MEMBER MEM WHERE M.BRANCH_SQ = B.BSEQ AND M.SLAVE_SQ = MEM.MSEQ AND MEM.DEPT = #{dept} ORDER BY M.REGDATE DESC
SELECT ML.MLSEQ, ML.PRODUCT_SQ, P.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, ML.QUANTITY, P.CATEGORY, P.NOTE FROM MOVELIST ML, PRODUCT P WHERE ML.PRODUCT_SQ = P.PSEQ AND ML.MOVE_SQ = #{mseq} ORDER BY ML.MLSEQ

SELECT B.BSEQ AS BRANCH_SQ, B.NAME AS BRANCH_NAME, B.MANAGER, B.PHONE, B.LOCATION, M.KIND, M.MSEQ, M.TITLE, M.SLAVE_SQ, MEM.NAME AS SLAVE_NAME, MEM.POSITION AS SLAVE_POSITION, M.ESTDATE, M.EXPDATE FROM MOVE M, BRANCH B, MEMBER MEM WHERE M.BRANCH_SQ = B.BSEQ AND M.SLAVE_SQ = MEM.MSEQ AND M.MSEQ = #{mseq}

SELECT MA.MASEQ, MA.APPROVER AS APPROVER_SQ, MEM.NAME AS APPROVER_NAME, MEM.POSITION AS APPROVER_POSITION, PRIORITY, STATE FROM MOVEAPRV MA, MEMBER MEM WHERE MA.APPROVER = MEM.MSEQ AND MOVE_SQ = #{mseq} ORDER BY PRIORITY
mapper.update: UPDATE MOVEAPRV SET STATE = 'Y' WHERE MOVE_SQ = #{mseq} AND APPROVER = #{loginSeq};
UPDATE MOVE SET STATE = '결재완료' WHERE MSEQ = #{mseq};
